member.name: M:Novartis.Msi.PlugIns.WiffLoader.MrmScanExperiment.FormatImageFuzzy(System.Single[][],System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Copy the data from wiff file datastream to the rectangular array. Take account of the line offset and the line break timings.
member.param: The allocate 2-dimensional array to receive the formated image.
The index of the massrange for which generate an image.
The calculated time a linebreak consumes.
The calculated time offset to the first valid intensity value.

member.name: M:Novartis.Msi.PlugIns.WiffLoader.MrmScanExperiment.FormatImageSharp(System.Single[][],System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Copy the data from wiff file datastream to the rectangular array. Take account of the line offset and the line break timings.
member.param: The allocate 2-dimensional array to receive the formated image.
The index of the massrange for which generate an image.
The calculated time a linebreak consumes.
The calculated time offset to the first valid intensity value.
member.returns: A double value indicating the quality of the image. This is only in effect in the process of heuristic optimization.

member.name: M:Novartis.Msi.PlugIns.WiffLoader.MrmScanExperiment.HeuristicOptimization(System.Single[][],System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Try to optimize the values for the timeoffset and the the linebreak by varying the values and analyzing the calculated images.
member.param: The allocated 2-dimensional array to receive the formated image.
The index of the massrange for which generate an image.
The calculated time a linebreak consumes. This value will be optimized.

member.name: M:Novartis.Msi.PlugIns.WiffLoader.WiffFileContent.GetMaldiParameters(System.String)
member.summary: This routine reads the contents of the Wiff file and extracts the Maldi parameters. This routine is a bit of a "hack" because the current Ab Sciex DLL's do not support the Maldi parametershttp://www.skyscanner.net/flights-to/bsl/cheap-flights-to-basel-mulhouse-freiburg-airport.html This routine there is only a single experiment in the WIFF file. If there are more, the the ones from the first experiment set the values of the Maldi parameters
